original_title: อำแดงเหมือนกับนายริด
overview: The true story of Muen, a Thai woman living in the 1800s under the rule of King Mongkut. At that time, women had no rights. Wives and daughters were bought and sold as if they were cattle.  Muen is regarded as being the first Thai woman to stand up for women's rights.
tagline: A true story of the very first woman who fought for women's rights in Thailand.
title: Muen and Rid
